name: SimplGUI
tagline: SimplGUI is simple GUI library for SFML. It provides simple widgets that can be used independently and easily in projects.
body:
# SimplGUI
SimplGUI is simple GUI library for SFML. It provides simple widgets that can be used independently and easily in projects.

**Currently, SimplGUI is under development. However, you can already test the TextBox widgets that provides most of the features of a text box.**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
